bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing proxymap from 'read' accesses on the lnk_file log.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: SELinux is preventing proxymap from 'read' accesses on the lnk_file log.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If cree que de manera predeterminada, proxymap debería permitir acceso read sobre log lnk_file. Then debería reportar esto como un error. Puede generar un módulo de política local para permitir este acceso. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'proxymap' --raw | audit2allow -M my-proxymap # semodule -X 300 -i my-proxymap.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:postfix_master_t:s0 Target Context system_u:object_r:tmpfs_t:s0 Target Objects log [ lnk_file ] Source proxymap Source Path proxymap Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Permissive Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.8.11-300.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Nov 28 18:24:51 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 243 First Seen 2016-11-26 19:48:19 CET Last Seen 2016-12-07 12:12:47 CET Local ID 695d1b44-b198-4fde-b7fc-c0591e3ba16f
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1481109167.439:335): avc: denied { read } for pid=6100 comm="trivial-rewrite" name="log" dev="tmpfs" ino=22470 scontext=system_u:system_r:postfix_master_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:tmpfs_t:s0 tclass=lnk_file permissive=1
Hash: proxymap,postfix_master_t,tmpfs_t,lnk_file,read
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.8.11-300.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
